content.raw:
As you wish :) I merged changes already into our own atlas model repo (https://github.com/team-vigir/vigir_atlas_common) and we´ll test with real robot soon.

Old model:

![rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_01_54.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bae8oa/images/1859257070-rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_01_54.png)
![rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_01_44.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bae8oa/images/1478681725-rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_01_44.png)



Updated model:

![rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_07_09.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bae8oa/images/862891896-rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_07_09.png)
![rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_07_20.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bae8oa/images/1253470684-rviz_screenshot_2015_03_09-17_07_20.png)

Looks good to me.
